function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Conduct a thorough analysis of behavior changes during the lockdown period to inform disease mitigation strategies","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement noise reduction measures and stress management programs to minimize the impact of noise pollution on health","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct a comprehensive health impact assessment of noise pollution using multidisciplinary approaches","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing social distancing measures, using face masks, and improving ventilation systems in buildings.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of communal areas, promoting hand hygiene, and providing hand sanitizing stations.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement automated data extraction techniques to minimize human contact with potentially contaminated materials","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement a comprehensive classification model with human validation to ensure accuracy","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide psychological support and counseling for individuals involved in manual tweet extraction","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use multiple data sources for a more comprehensive understanding of public attitudes towards noise","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consider external factors such as seasonal variations and events in the comparison of attitudes towards
